titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Navy to transfer, without regard to the required waiting period, an obsolete naval vessel to the United States Naval Shipbuilding Museum, Quincy, Massachusetts, upon making certain determinations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Acquisition.

bill.summary: 11/2/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the Navy to transfer to the U.S. Navy Shipbuilding Museum in Quincy, Massachusetts, the obsolete heavy cruiser U.S.S. Salem, notwithstanding a required waiting period for such transfers.
